entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023
